Hi fans,

Just wanted to let you know that our current monthly tournament is featuring the World Cup Cricket. Are you there predicting the outcome of each match?

Regards,
FBG Team.

Dear Users,

On this auspicious festival of lights, May the glow of joy, prosperity and happiness illuminate your days in the year ahead. Happy Diwali.

Thanks,
FBG Team.
